"Chaotic Tranquility":
"A large number of enemies have just
appeared in the Urban District.
In addition to Darkers, Natives, Mechs and
Dragonkin have been confirmed.
...It is possible they have undergone some
kind of brainwashing. We have no choice.
All ARKS, deploy and wipe them out.
――――――――――――――――――――
Clear by collecting [1000] Quest Points.
Failure: Time limit expires."
